thread.title: UP Police Recruitment 2025 : Announcement for 22,605 Constable Vacancies, Exams Begin in November
thread.title_full: UP Police Recruitment 2025 : Announcement for 22,605 Constable Vacancies, Exams Begin in November

author: Sakshi education
title: UP Police Recruitment 2025 : Announcement for 22,605 Constable Vacancies, Exams Begin in November
text:
UP Police Recruitment 2025 : Announcement for 22,605 Constable Vacancies, Exams Begin in November
According to the newly released calendar, the largest and most anticipated recruitment drive for 22,605 constable posts will commence in November 2025.
This calendar provides a structured and transparent roadmap for upcoming police recruitments, detailing the post-wise vacancies, expected dates for notifications, and examination timelines. It ensures that the recruitment process is systematic, time-bound, and fair, eliminating uncertainty for aspirants.
What is the UP Police Calendar 2025?
The UP Police Calendar 2025 is a comprehensive recruitment schedule prepared by the UPPRPB. It includes, Notification release dates, Tentative exam timelines & Post-wise vacancy distribution.
Post-wise Details:
Sub Inspector Civil Police, Platoon Commander PAC, Sub Inspector Armed Police, Sub Inspector Special Security Force- 4,543 (Notification in August, 2025)
Recruitments at TSLPRB - Notification Released for 1,743 Vacancies, Checkout Eligibilities and Selections to Apply Online
Police Sub Inspector (Confidential), Police ASI (Clerk), Police ASI (Accounts)- 921 (Written Exam in Oct/Nov, 2025)
Computer Operator Grade-A- 1,129 (Written Exam in Oct/Nov, 2025)
Assistant Radio Operator- 44 (Written Exam in Oct/Nov, 2025)
Computer Operator Grade-A (additional)- 1,153 (Written Exam in Oct/Nov, 2025)
Constable Civil Police, Constable PAC, Constable SSF, Constable PAC (Women), Jail Warder, Mounted Police- 12,605 (Notification in November 2025)
Police SI (Confidential), Police ASI (Clerk), Police ASI (Accounts)- 345 (Notification in December, 2025)
The centerpiece of this year's recruitment is undoubtedly the drive for 22,605 Constable vacancies. These posts span various wings of the police force, including:
Civil Police, Provincial Armed Constabulary (PAC), Special Security Force (SSF), Women Constables, Jail Warders.
APPSC Notification Released for Assistant Executive Engineer (Civil) Posts
Mounted Police
This recruitment drive is expected to generate record-breaking participation, as constable posts are consistently among the most competitive and sought-after government positions in Uttar Pradesh.
Growing Competition and Application Trends
The competition for UP Police jobs is increasing sharply each year. In the most recent Sub Inspector recruitment, a staggering 15.75 lakh candidates applied for just 4,543 posts:
11.66 lakh male candidates & 4.09 lakh female candidates
Given these trends, it is highly likely that over 20 lakh candidates may apply for the upcoming 22,605 constable posts. This makes the 2025 recruitment cycle one of the most competitive ever in the history of UP Police hiring.
Key Takeaway: Candidates must begin preparing seriously and consistently. Success will depend on a combination of smart strategy, regular practice, and deep understanding of the syllabus and exam pattern.
30,000 to be Filled:
The UP Police Recruitment Calendar 2025 confirms that over 30,000 vacancies will be filled this year across various cadres. This includes Constables, Sub Inspectors, Assistant Sub Inspectors, Computer Operators, Technical Support Staff
For further details, visit official website.
